tools.detailed_description: A tool for molecular editing that uses multimodal and group-optimized generative learning to modify molecular structures while preserving desired properties.

tools.name: PyBerny
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular structure optimizer and geometry optimization library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for molecular structure optimization, implementing the Berny algorithm for geometry optimization in computational chemistry.

tools.name: MSO
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-objective molecular optimization in continuous latent space
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of efficient multi-objective molecular optimization using continuous latent spaces, facilitating the discovery of molecules satisfying multiple constraints.

tools.name: EvoMol
tools.one_line_profile: Evolutionary algorithm for molecular property optimization
tools.detailed_description: An evolutionary algorithm designed for the optimization of molecular properties, serving as a baseline or tool for de novo drug design.

tools.name: SQUID
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant shape-conditioned generation of 3D molecules
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for generating 3D molecules conditioned on shape information, utilizing equivariant networks for ligand-based drug design.

tools.name: Molecule Generator (Graph)
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-objective de novo drug design with conditional graph generation
tools.detailed_description: A conditional graph generative model for multi-objective de novo drug design, allowing for the generation of molecules with specific property constraints.

tools.name: DeepPurpose
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning toolkit for drug-target interaction and property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive deep learning toolkit for Drug-Target Interaction (DTI) prediction, drug property prediction, Protein-Protein Interaction (PPI), and Drug-Drug Interaction (DDI).

tools.name: torch-molecule
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for molecular property prediction and design
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning package for molecular discovery designed with an sklearn-style interface. It supports property prediction, inverse design, and representation learning for drug discovery tasks.

tools.name: fragment-based-dgm
tools.one_line_profile: Deep generative model for fragment-based molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: Code for a deep generative model that generates molecules by assembling fragments, useful for de novo drug design.

tools.name: SVDD
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion models with soft value-based decoding for bio-molecules
tools.detailed_description: Implements derivative-free guidance in diffusion models for controlled generation of DNA, RNA, proteins, and small molecules.

tools.name: LiGAN
tools.one_line_profile: Deep generative models of 3D grids for drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: A deep generative model framework that works with 3D grids (atomic density grids) for structure-based drug discovery and ligand generation.

tools.name: molecule-generation
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model of molecular graphs (MoLeR)
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of MoLeR, a graph-based generative model for molecules that supports scaffold-constrained generation, developed by Microsoft.

tools.name: RUSH
tools.one_line_profile: Scaffold hopping with generative reinforcement learning
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of RuSH for scaffold hopping using generative reinforcement learning. Includes ScaffoldFinder for 2D decoration identification and 3D shape-based scoring plugins.

tools.name: s4-for-de-novo-drug-design
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical language modeling with structured state space models
tools.detailed_description: Codebase applying Structured State Space Sequence Models (S4) to chemical language modeling for de novo drug design.

tools.name: traversing_chem_space
tools.one_line_profile: Active deep learning for low-data drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: Implements active deep learning strategies for traversing chemical space to discover small molecules, specifically designed for low-data drug discovery scenarios.

tools.name: MOSES
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking platform for molecular generation models
tools.detailed_description: Molecular Sets (MOSES) is a benchmarking platform to evaluate and compare the performance of molecular generation models using standardized datasets and metrics.

tools.name: diffusion-conformer
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion-based molecule conformer generation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating molecular conformers using diffusion models, aiding in 3D structure analysis and docking preparation.

tools.name: RL-GraphINVENT
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based targeted molecular generation platform
tools.detailed_description: A platform for graph-based targeted molecular generation using graph neural networks and reinforcement learning to optimize molecular properties.

tools.name: openff-bespokefit
tools.one_line_profile: Automated bespoke force field parameter generation
tools.detailed_description: Automated tools for generating bespoke SMIRNOFF format force field parameters for individual molecules, supporting molecular dynamics and docking simulations.

tools.name: Deep-Drug-Coder
tools.one_line_profile: Generative neural network for de novo drug design
tools.detailed_description: A TensorFlow/Keras based generative neural network for de novo drug design, capable of generating novel molecular structures.

tools.name: MolDiff
tools.one_line_profile: 3D molecule diffusion generation addressing atom-bond inconsistency
tools.detailed_description: A diffusion-based generative model for 3D molecules that specifically addresses the atom-bond inconsistency problem during generation.

tools.name: Pocket2Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient molecular sampling based on 3D protein pockets
tools.detailed_description: A structure-based drug design tool that efficiently samples and generates molecules conditioned on 3D protein pocket structures.

tools.name: ED2Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Electron-density-informed de novo molecular design
tools.detailed_description: A tool for de novo molecular design and optimization that utilizes electron density information to guide the generation process.

tools.name: funcmol
tools.one_line_profile: Score-based 3D molecule generation using neural fields
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing a score-based generative model for 3D molecule generation using neural fields, as presented at NeurIPS 2024.

tools.name: pylewis
tools.one_line_profile: Lewis structure based Fermi-orbital descriptor generation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating Fermi-orbital descriptors based on Lewis structures, useful in electronic structure theory and quantum chemistry.

tools.name: HierDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical diffusion model for 3D molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a coarse-to-fine hierarchical diffusion model for generating 3D molecular structures, as presented at ICML 2023.

tools.name: restraintmaker
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to build restraints for Molecular Dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to generate position or distance restraints for Molecular Dynamics (MD) simulations, usable as a script or PyMOL plugin.

tools.name: Solubility-Prediction-GNN
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular solubility prediction using Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network (GNN) implementation for predicting molecular solubility, utilizing RDKit for feature extraction.

tools.name: LAMMPS-LMFF
tools.one_line_profile: Layered Materials Force Field expansion for LAMMPS
tools.detailed_description: An expansion of the LAMMPS potential function based on Tersoff and inter-layer potentials, optimized for layered materials like graphene and boron hexanitride.

tools.name: LegoGram
tools.one_line_profile: Optimized molecular grammars for molecule discovery
tools.detailed_description: A tool implementing optimized molecular grammars to facilitate the discovery of new molecules.

tools.name: matbench-genmetrics
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking metrics for generative materials models
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing metrics for benchmarking generative models in materials science, inspired by Guacamol and CDVAE.

tools.name: DeepFMPO
tools.one_line_profile: Deep RL for multiparameter optimization in drug design
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of deep reinforcement learning for multiparameter optimization in de novo drug design.

tools.name: TransRot
tools.one_line_profile: Monte Carlo geometry optimization for molecular clusters
tools.detailed_description: Molecular modeling software for simulated annealing Monte Carlo geometry optimizations of atomic and molecular clusters.

tools.name: DeepLBVS
tools.one_line_profile: Ligand-based Virtual Screening using Deep Learning
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning implementation for ligand-based virtual screening tasks in drug discovery.

tools.name: MUBDsyn
tools.one_line_profile: Bias control benchmark for virtual screening with Deep RL
tools.detailed_description: Official repository for the CBM paper focusing on deep reinforcement learning for better bias control in virtual screening benchmarks.

tools.name: tqchem
tools.one_line_profile: Library for molecular structure manipulation and optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for efficient manipulation, conformer optimization, and handling of molecular structure data.

tools.name: gopt
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular structure optimization and reaction pathway determination
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for optimizing molecular structures and determining chemical reaction pathways.

tools.name: MolScribe
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Structure Recognition with Image-to-Graph Generation
tools.detailed_description: A robust tool for molecular structure recognition that converts images of chemical structures into molecular graphs (SMILES/Molfile).

tools.name: LSTM_Chem
tools.one_line_profile: Generative Recurrent Networks for De Novo Drug Design
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Generative Recurrent Networks (LSTM-based) for de novo drug design and molecule generation.

tools.name: ChemGE
tools.one_line_profile: De Novo Molecule Generation using Grammatical Evolution
tools.detailed_description: A population-based de novo molecule generation tool using grammatical evolution techniques.

tools.name: LICO
tools.one_line_profile: Large Language Models for In-Context Molecular Optimization
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of LICO, a method using Large Language Models for in-context molecular optimization.

tools.name: reinvent-gdb13
tools.one_line_profile: RNN for generating molecules from GDB-13
tools.detailed_description: A Recurrent Neural Network implementation trained on GDB-13 to generate SMILES strings for small molecules.

tools.name: reinvent-randomized
tools.one_line_profile: RNN using randomized SMILES for molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: A Recurrent Neural Network model that utilizes randomized SMILES strings to improve molecule generation diversity.

tools.name: reinvent-scaffold-decorator
tools.one_line_profile: SMILES-based scaffold decoration tool
tools.detailed_description: An encoder-decoder architecture designed for molecular scaffold decoration, allowing the generation of molecules around a fixed core.

tools.name: HN-GFN
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-objective Molecular Optimization with GFlowNets
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Sample-efficient Multi-objective Molecular Optimization with GFlowNets (NeurIPS 2023).

tools.name: graph2graph
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal graph-to-graph translation model for molecular optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the ICLR 2019 paper 'Learning Multimodal Graph-to-Graph Translation for Molecular Optimization'. It provides a junction tree variational autoencoder (JT-VAE) based approach for translating molecular graphs to optimize chemical properties.

tools.name: multiobj-rationale
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-objective molecule generation model using interpretable substructures
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the ICML 2020 paper for generating molecules that satisfy multiple objectives simultaneously. It utilizes a rationale-based approach to assemble molecules from interpretable substructures, improving the success rate of multi-property optimization in drug discovery.

tools.name: FLAG
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-based molecule generation model using structural motifs
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the ICLR 2023 paper 'Molecule Generation for Target Protein Binding with Structural Motifs'. FLAG is a 3D generative model designed for structure-based drug design (SBDD), capable of linker design and fragment growing by leveraging structural motifs.

tools.name: Mol-Instructions
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale biomolecular instruction dataset for LLMs
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive dataset designed to improve the capability of Large Language Models (LLMs) in the biomolecular domain. It includes instructions for molecule generation, protein engineering, and other chemical/biological tasks, facilitating the training of domain-specific AI models.

tools.name: MolGen
tools.one_line_profile: Domain-agnostic molecular generation model with chemical feedback
tools.detailed_description: A molecular generation model based on the ICLR 2024 paper. It employs a pre-training and self-feedback mechanism to generate valid and chemically relevant molecules, aiming to be domain-agnostic and robust for various drug discovery tasks.

tools.name: PickyBinder
tools.one_line_profile: Automated workflow for benchmarking molecular docking tools against high-quality datasets
tools.detailed_description: PickyBinder is a workflow designed to benchmark various docking tools. It focuses on using high-quality protein-ligand datasets to evaluate the accuracy and reliability of docking predictions.

tools.name: spyrmsd
tools.one_line_profile: Python tool for symmetry-corrected RMSD calculation in molecular structures
tools.detailed_description: spyrmsd is a Python library for calculating Root-Mean-Square Deviation (RMSD) between molecular structures. It specifically handles symmetry correction, making it essential for accurately comparing ligand poses in docking and molecular dynamics.

tools.name: rmsd
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight tool to calculate Root-Mean-Square Deviation (RMSD) between two molecular structures
tools.detailed_description: This tool calculates the Root-Mean-Square Deviation (RMSD) of two molecules in XYZ or PDB format. It supports rotation (superposition) to find the minimum RMSD, a critical metric for validating docking poses.

tools.name: Apobind
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset of apo structures for protein-ligand complexes
tools.detailed_description: Apobind provides a curated collection of apo (unbound) protein structures corresponding to the protein-ligand complexes found in the PDBbind database, useful for docking validation.

tools.name: Muview2
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for micromagnetic simulations
tools.detailed_description: Muview2 is a 3D visualization tool designed for rendering micromagnetic simulation data generated by Mumax or OOMMF software.

tools.name: rmsd-tool
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for calculating RMSD between molecular structures
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran-based tool from the Grimme Lab to calculate the Root Mean Square Deviation (RMSD) between molecular structures, essential for structural comparison.

tools.name: BM5-clean
tools.one_line_profile: Cleaned Docking Benchmark 5 dataset
tools.detailed_description: A cleaned version of the Docking Benchmark 5 (BM5) dataset, ready for use with HADDOCK and other docking protocols for validation purposes.

tools.name: MemCplxDB
tools.one_line_profile: Membrane protein complexes docking benchmark
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset specifically for membrane protein complexes, used to evaluate docking algorithms on membrane-embedded systems.

tools.name: Prot-DNABenchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-DNA docking benchmark dataset
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset for evaluating protein-DNA docking methods, maintained by the HADDOCK team.

tools.name: cyclic-peptides
tools.one_line_profile: Cyclic peptide-protein complexes benchmark
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset containing cyclic peptide-protein complexes, including associated scripts and data for docking validation.

tools.name: PoseBusters EM
tools.one_line_profile: Energy minimization module for PoseBusters
tools.detailed_description: A post-processing tool for energy minimization of molecular poses, used as part of the PoseBusters validation suite.

tools.name: CasFinder
tools.one_line_profile: CRISPR-Cas systems models for MacSyFinder
tools.detailed_description: A collection of HMM profiles and model definitions for detecting CRISPR-Cas systems using the MacSyFinder tool.

tools.name: protein-ligand-benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset for free energy calculations
tools.detailed_description: A curated benchmark dataset maintained by the Open Force Field Initiative for evaluating protein-ligand binding free energy calculations.

tools.name: antibody_benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Antibody-Antigen Docking and Affinity Benchmark
tools.detailed_description: A standard benchmark dataset for evaluating antibody-antigen docking and affinity prediction methods, maintained by the Pierce Lab.

tools.name: muv
tools.one_line_profile: Generator for Maximum Unbiased Validation (MUV) datasets in virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to generate Maximum Unbiased Validation (MUV) datasets for benchmarking virtual screening methods. It implements algorithms to select active and decoy molecules that are topologically distinct but share similar physical properties, thereby removing artificial enrichment bias and providing a rigorous standard for validating docking and scoring functions.
